alert.note: Alert for Ellis; Harper; Woodward (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Freeze Warning issued October 15 at 3:32AM CDT until October 16 at 9:00AM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...FROST ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM CDT THIS MORNING... ...FREEZE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 4 AM TO 9 AM CDT MONDAY... * WHAT...For the Frost Advisory, temperatures as low as 36 will result in frost formation. For the Freeze Warning, temperatures as low as 31 are expected. * WHERE...Harper, Ellis and Woodward Counties. * WHEN...For the Frost Advisory, until 9 AM CDT this morning. For the Freeze Warning, from 4 AM to 9 AM CDT Monday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.
